content:
#### 6. Changing Your Policy
You may request Us to change a term in Your Policy. The change takes place only when We confirm it in writing to You or endorse it on Your Schedule, and You pay any additional premium that We require.

#### 7. What can Affect Your Entitlement
If You do not comply with any condition of Your Policy, it may affect the coverage and benefits afforded by this Policy.
questions: How can I request a change in my insurance policy terms?
What is the process to modify a term in my policy?
When does a change in policy terms become effective?
Is there any additional cost involved when changing a policy term?
How will I be notified of a confirmed change in my policy?
What could potentially affect my entitlement to coverage and benefits under my policy?
What happens if I fail to comply with a condition of my policy?
Can non-compliance with policy conditions lead to reduced benefits?
What documentation will I receive to confirm a policy term change?
Who confirms changes to the terms of my insurance policy?
